line_1: To rouze the brave, and banish sloth;
line_2: But evils are of necessary growth,

line_1: Of AV'RICE born, and nurs'd by SLOTH;
line_2: A friend they chose, a friend to both,

line_1: Come, lig no more upon the Bed of Sloth,
line_2: Fond to begin but still to finish loth,

line_1: Come, lig no more upon the Bed of Sloth,
line_2: Thy half-writ Scrolls all eaten by the Moth:

line_1: Come, lig no more upon the Bed of Sloth,
line_2: Who with the Sons of Softness nobly wroth,

line_1: And quit your pillow with reluctant sloth,
line_2: While tasteless you can greet her smiles so loth;

line_1: The robe that wraps his limbs in silken sloth,
line_2: Has robb'd the neighbouring fields of half their growth;

line_1: Allows short time for play, and none for sloth,
line_2: And felt alike by each, advances both,
